org.projectnyx.config

Class ConfigParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectnyx.config.ConfigParser

  • public class ConfigParser
extends Object
    The class for parsing a Nyx-style XML config file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigParser(File file)
      Creates a parser on a Nyx-style XML config file.
      ConfigParser(InputStream is)
      Creates a parser that reads a Nyx-style XML config from an InputStream
      ConfigParser(Reader reader)
      Creates a parser that reads a Nyx-style XML config from a Reader

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public ConfigElement parse()
                    throws NumberFormatException,
                           IOException
        Parses the config and returns the config root.
        Returns:
        the root config element that this config holds
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - if any config formatting errors are encountered, or if a config entry has a mismatched type (e.g. a supposedly integer field is not a number)
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        See Also:
        org.projectnyx.config
